explains: v. 移居外国，移民；迫使（或帮助）……移居外国

sentences.en: The men emigrate to work as seamen.
sentences.cn: 这些男人移居国外当海员。

sentences.en: Everybody was flabbergasted when I announced I was going to emigrate to Australia.
sentences.cn: 当我宣布要移民去澳大利亚时，所有人都惊呆了。

sentences.en: Certain formalities have to be gone through before you can emigrate.
sentences.cn: 必须办理一定的手续方能移居他国。
